1011100000000111 1000101011000111 0 -> sum: 0100001011001110, cout: 1

0111111100111001 1011010010110011 0 -> sum: 0011001111101100, cout: 1

0100000000101110 1001111011100111 0 -> sum: 1101111100010101, cout: 0
1100011101000011 0011011000011000 0 -> sum: 1111110101011011, cout: 0
